product_overview: A modern, interactive portfolio website showcasing the developer's skills, projects, and contact information, built with Next.js 14 and featuring advanced animations and UI effects.
core_goals: Provide an engaging and visually appealing personal portfolio to showcase skills and projects.
Ensure responsive design for optimal viewing on all devices including mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Implement smooth and modern animations to enhance user experience without performance degradation.
Offer a functional contact form integrated with an email service for direct communication.
Optimize SEO for better search engine visibility and accessibility.
key_features: Custom TargetCursor with interactive corner brackets and smooth animations that replace the default cursor.
Magic Bento Grid: an interactive card layout with hover effects, magnetism, and particle animations for portfolio and skill display.
Scroll Reveal animations that trigger elements as they scroll into view for dynamic page interaction.
Typing Animation and Decrypted Text effects for dynamic role/title presentation.
Dock Navigation emulating macOS style with hover effects for intuitive site navigation.
Dot Grid Background that interacts with cursor proximity for subtle dynamic background effects.
Contact Form with validation and functional email integration using Resend API.
Project Showcase section highlighting featured projects with details and clickable links.
Responsive and mobile-first design with an elegant dark theme and gradient accents.
SEO optimization including meta tags, structured data, sitemap, and robots.txt for enhanced discoverability.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Home page to see an introduction with dynamic typing animation and calls-to-action in the Hero Section.
User scrolls down to explore About Section presented in an interactive Bento Grid layout with hover and particle animations.
User navigates through Skills and Projects Sections with smooth scroll and scroll reveal animations enhancing content engagement.
User accesses the Dock Navigation to jump between sections or external social links such as GitHub and LinkedIn.
User fills and submits the Contact Form with form validation and receives confirmation of successful submission via integration with the Resend API.
User can download the Resume and interact with social links available on the site.
validation_criteria: All interactive animations such as TargetCursor, Magic Bento Grid, typing, and scroll reveal run smoothly across supported browsers.
Contact Form validates input fields correctly and prevents submission of invalid data.
Emails sent through the Contact Form are successfully delivered via Resend API and appropriate success/failure feedback is shown to the user.
Site layout is fully responsive and visually consistent on all supported devices and screen sizes.
SEO best practices are implemented: meta tags exist on pages, sitemap and robots.txt file are present and correctly configured.
Dark theme styling is consistently applied and toggle or preference-based dark mode is stable across sessions.
